publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3213 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Faslane Peace Campâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Faslane peace camp on achieving its 20th year of peaceful protest in the campaign for a nuclear-free world.
S1M-3213 Dorothy-Grace Elder: Faslane Peace Camp-That the Parliament congratulates the Faslane peace camp on achieving its 20th year of peaceful protest in the campaign for a nuclear-free world.
S1M-3213 Faslane Peace Camp (lodged on 13 June 2002) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Mr Gil Paterson*
